typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameterDateHeureDemarrage as string
}
source(output(
		DateHeureDynamique as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: (concat("SELECT CAST(",toString($parameterDateHeureDemarrage, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ")," AS smalldatetime) AS DateHeureDynamique")),
	format: 'query') ~> sourceDatesEtHeures
sourceDatesEtHeures sink(input(
		DateHeure as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		DateHeure = DateHeureDynamique
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkDatesEtHeures
